mapper.update:
update pg_stat_replication
pid = #{row.pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usesysid = #{row.usesysid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
usename = #{row.usename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
application_name = #{row.applicationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sync_priority = #{row.syncPriority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sync_state = #{row.syncState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reply_time = #{row.replyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
